ability.Prehistoric Fury: This Pokemon's Dragon-type moves have their power multiplied by 1.5 when its HP is below half.
ability.Metallic Resilience: This Pokemon is immune to status conditions while its HP is above half.

Iron Tail.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Fossil Fang.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Ancient Roar.effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.

Steel Slash.effect: Has a 10% chance to increase the user's Speed by 1 stage.
